tag.name: cfparam
tag.help: Tests for a parameter's existence, tests its data type, and, if a default value is not assigned, optionally provides one.

parameter.name: name
parameter.help: Name of parameter to test (such as "Client.Email " or "Cookie.BackgroundColor "). If omitted, and if the parameter does not exist, an error is thrown.

parameter.name: default
parameter.help: Value to set parameter to if it does not exist.
